column4: Hiya, could anyone give me a hand for a sec? I've just downloaded Firefox 1.5b2 but when I extract it and double click firefox and choose run nothing happens.

any way to change file permissions of a folder, all its subfolders and files so i can write to them? they are currently set to read only and its 3500 files.. cant go to each one and manually do it.. must be a better way?
open a terminal and type "man chmod"
ugh confusing >_< so to make all subfolders and files of a dir read and write I'd do this? chmod +rw /folder?
paste your error to a pastebin
omg.. 66 new packages will be installed? :|
that is why your make failed
